item.lockdown.upgrade.control_tower.hint: Binds target to a control tower
item.lockdown.upgrade.range.hint: Increases firing range of the target
item.lockdown.upgrade.flamethrower.hint: Installs a flamethrower on the target
subtitles.lockdown.drone.target: Drone Prepares to Obliterate its Target
advancement.lockdown.root.title: Lockdown
advancement.lockdown.root.description: Welcome to Lockdown, the datapack for all your security needs!
advancement.lockdown.encoder.title: Encoding Station
advancement.lockdown.encoder.description: The Encoding Station assigns codes to certain blocks/items for a wireless signal.  Use three dye to represent the code.
advancement.lockdown.alarms.title: Weewoo!
advancement.lockdown.alarms.description: Craft a wireless alarm light.  These are powered with a wireless signal.
advancement.lockdown.angry_drone.title: Robot Uprising
advancement.lockdown.big_buttons.title: End-of-The-World Button
advancement.lockdown.big_buttons.descrip: Craft a wireless big button.  Outputs a wireless signal when powered.
advancement.lockdown.blacklight.title: This is Beyond Science
advancement.lockdown.drone.title: Our Robot Overlords
advancement.lockdown.drone.description: Craft a defense drone to patrol the area
advancement.lockdown.control_tower.title: Do You Copy?
advancement.lockdown.control_tower.descr: Craft a Control Tower to keep bound drones within a certain area.
advancement.lockdown.control_tower_upgra: Use a drone control tower upgrade on a drone so it can receive commands from a tower.
Increase the durability of a drone or turret by throwing a durability upgrade at it.
advancement.lockdown.flamethrower_upgrad: Supercharge a drone/turret's laser to set targets on fire by throwing a flamethrower upgrade at it.
advancement.lockdown.range_upgrade.title: Range Upgrade
advancement.lockdown.range_upgrade.descr: Increase the range of a drone or turret by throwing a range upgrade at it.
advancement.lockdown.force_field_project: The force field projector generates an indestructible force field.  Right-click the block to adjust the field size.
advancement.lockdown.keycard.title: Access Granted
advancement.lockdown.keycard.description: A keycard will trigger all keycard readers within five blocks that have the same code.
advancement.lockdown.keycard_reader.desc: Craft a wireless keycard reader.  Outputs a wireless signal when powered.
advancement.lockdown.klaxon.title: AWOOGAA!
advancement.lockdown.klaxon.description: When powered, the klaxon will audibly remind you of the impending disaster.
advancement.lockdown.laser_projector.des: Craft a laser projector to guard against intruders.
advancement.lockdown.mob_detector.title: Mob Detector
advancement.lockdown.mob_detector.descri: The mob detector outputs a redstone signal when it detects a mob within a five-block radius.
advancement.lockdown.player_detector.des: The player detector outputs a redstone signal if a player is within a five-block radius.
advancement.lockdown.wireless_receiver.d: Pick up a redstone signal from any wireless device with the same code.
advancement.lockdown.wireless_transmitte: Wirelessly send a redstone signal to any receiver with the same code.
advancement.lockdown.turret.title: "Defensive" Measures
advancement.lockdown.turret.description: Craft an autonomous LASER TURRET.  Use the encoder to pair to a keycard.
death.attack.lockdown.laser.item: %1$s was reduced to atoms by %2$s using %3$s
